1: -module(word_collector_SUITE).
    2: -author("oscar_toro").
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include("../include/diccionario.hrl").
    5: -export([init_per_suite/1,all/0,add_word/1,
    6: 	get_all_words/1,word_by_name/1]).
    7: 
    8: all() ->
    9:     [add_word,get_all_words,word_by_name].
   10: 
   11: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   12:     Priv = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   13:     wc_mnesia:install([node()]),
   14:     word_collector_app:start(),
   15:     Config.
   16: 
   17: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   18:     application:stop(mnesia),
   19:     ok.
   20: 
   21: init_per_testcase(get_all_words,Config)->
   22:     {atomic,ok} = wc_mnesia:add_word("hej","hola"),
   23:     {atomic,ok} = wc_mnesia:add_word("hej hej", "chao"),
   24:     Config;
   25: init_per_testcase(word_by_name,Config) ->
   26:     {atomic,ok} = wc_mnesia:add_word("blondine","rubia"),
   27:     {atomic,ok} = wc_mnesia:add_word("poloti", "policia"),
   28:     Config.
   29: 
   30: 
   31: %% cases
   32: add_word(_Config) ->
   33:     {atomic,ok} = wc_mnesia:add_word("kat","gato"),
   34:     {atomic,ok} = wc_mnesia:add_word("robot","robot").
   35: 
   36: get_all_words(_Config) ->
   37:    [One,Two] = wc_mnesia:get_all_words().
   38:     
   39: word_by_name(_Config) ->
   40:     [Word] = wc_mnesia:find_word("blondine"),
   41:     [] = wc_mnesia:find_word("k√∏re").
